segments.text: Come to think of it , you should get out your English books and catch up on your reading assignments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don't have any reading assignments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then review for your test . You'll do even better . And maybe reading will help you get to sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You say that now , Lily , but you'll thank me later . I'm your mom , and mother knows best .
segments.speaker: S1
